これはハイペリオン号の損害検出報告書よ……今のところ全艦で67%の外装甲が完全に損傷。さらに内部隔壁も……。
이건 히페리온호의 손상 검출 보고서야…… 현재 전함의 67% 외장갑이 완전히 손상되었어. 게다가 내부 격벽도…….
Here's the report on the Hyperion's current condition... 67% of the ship's exterior armor has been completely damaged. In addition, the internal bulkheads are...

This is the damage detection report for the Hyperion. ...... So far, 67% of the exterior armor is completely damaged on the entire ship. In addition, the internal bulkheads are also .......
speaker
portraits
msg
None of that matters. The most important thing now is to get the power furnace back running. We must review the most feasible plan.
这些都不重要，现在最重要的是恢复动力炉的运作，目前最重要的是评估最可能实行的方案。
そんなのどれも後回しでいいわ。今、最も重要なのは動力炉の運転を回復できるかどうか。そして、今なすべきことは一番可能性が高い方法を考えることよ。
그런 건 모두 뒤로 미뤄도 돼. 지금 가장 중요한 건 동력로 가동을 복구할 수 있느냐야. 그리고 지금 당장 해야 할 일은 가장 가능성 높은 방법을 찾는 거야.
None of that matters. The most important thing right now is to see if we can get the generator up and running. We have to figure out the most feasible way to do that.
None of this matters, the most important thing now is to restore the operation of the power furnace, and the most important thing now is to evaluate the most likely option to implement.

None of that can wait. The most important thing right now is to see if we can get the power reactor back in operation. And the most important thing to do now is to figure out the most likely way to do that.
speaker
portraits
msg
We have the plan... But we have no supply of the key parts... Here is a list of parts I prepared. If we have them, we can last a bit longer.
方案是已经有了…但是关键的维修零件却无法补给…这是我整理的零件清单，如果有这些东西的话或许能再撑一会。
方法はある……けど、一番重要な修理部品が補給できないんじゃ……これはさっき整理した必要部品リストなんだけど、ここに書いてある物があれば少しは現状を打破できるかもしれない。
방법은 있어…… 하지만 가장 중요한 수리 부품을 구할 수 없다면…… 이건 아까 정리한 필수 부품 목록인데, 여기 적힌 것들만 있으면 현황을 타개할 수 있을지도 몰라.
We have a plan... But we can't supply the most important parts... Here is a list of parts I prepared. If we have them, we can last a bit longer.
The solution is already there...but the critical repair parts can't be replenished...here's the parts list I put together...if we had these things we might be able to last a little longer.

There are ways ...... but we can't supply the most important repair parts. ...... This is the list of parts needed that I just sorted out, but if we had the items listed here, we might be able to break out of our current situation a little. If we had the items listed here, we might be able to break out of our current situation a little bit.
portraits
msg
This is the minimum requirement already. Worst case scenario, we can use some car parts as replacement... But I really don’t want to modify a battleship into an automotive, if possible...
这已经是最低限度的需求了，实在不行的话用一些汽车的零部件代替也是可以的…但如果条件允许的话我可不想把一艘战舰改装成汽车……
これが最低限必要な部品。どうしてもダメなら自動車の部品で代替しても構わない……でも、できれば戦艦を自動車に改装したくないわね……。
이게 최소한 필요한 부품들이야. 정 안 되면 자동차 부품으로 대체해도 괜찮지만…… 가능하면 전함을 자동차로 개조하는 건 피하고 싶어…….

These are the absolute minimum requirements. In the worst case scenario, we can substitute some parts from from junk cars... But I'd rather not start converting a battleship into an automobile if possible...
This is already the minimum demand, really can not be replaced by some car parts can be ... but if conditions permit I do not want to convert a battleship into a car ......
These are the minimum parts needed. If you can't make it work, you can substitute automotive parts. ...... but I wouldn't want to convert a battleship into an automobile if possible. ......

分かったわ……どうにかして、これらを手に入れればいいのね……長空市の探査地図を持ってきて。

这是我们目前的位置，如果我没记错的话，在这个附近有一座大型的废弃停车场…就在这里。
ここが私たちの現在位置。記憶が間違っていなければ、この近くに大きな自動車スクラップ工場があったわ……ここよ。
여기가 우리 현재 위치. 기억이 틀리지 않았다면 이 근처에 큰 자동차 스크랩 공장이 있었어...... 여기야.
This is our current location. If I remember correctly, there is a large abandoned car park around here... Here it is.

msg
Do you mean we will find parts from this place? But it’s too far away... And it’s too dangerous outside. How are we getting there...
你的意思是要去这里找零件么？但这个距离也太远了吧…而且现在外面这么危险，要怎么过去呢……
そこに部品を探しに行くってこと？でも、さすがにこの距離は遠すぎない……？それに外は今とっても危険なのよ。どうやって行くの……？
거기에 부품을 찾으러 간다는 거? 하지만 이 거리는 너무 먼 거 아니야......? 게다가 밖은 지금 엄청 위험해. 어떻게 가려고......?
Do you mean to go here to find parts? But the distance is too far... And it's too dangerous to go out there now... How are we going to get there...?
Do you mean to go here to find parts? But this distance is too far...and it's so dangerous out there now, how to get over there ......
You mean to go there to look for parts? But isn't this distance indeed too far ......? Besides, it's very dangerous out there right now. How are you going to get there......?
speaker
portraits
msg
Leave that to the Greymoths. It may be a hell to you, but we are used to travelling in hell.
这些问题就交给灰蛾部队吧，对于你们来说可能是地狱，但是我们已经习惯在地狱中穿梭了。
それは灰蛾部隊に任せてちょうだい。あなたたちにとっては地獄かもしれないけれど、私たちは地獄の中をくぐり抜けるのに慣れているから。
그건 회나 부대에게 맡겨줘. 당신들에겐 지옥일지 몰라도 우린 지옥 속을 헤쳐 나가는 데 익숙하니까.
Leave these questions to the Grey Moths. It may be hell for you, but we're used to traveling through hell.
Leave these questions to the Grey Moth troops. It may be hell for you, but we're used to navigating through it.
Leave that to the ash moth squad. It may be hell for you guys, but we are used to going through hell.

portraits
msg
If that’s the case, bring more people with you. At least it will make it safer.
既然如此就多带点人吧，这样至少安全一些。
そういうことなら多めに人を連れて行って。その方が少しは安全だろう。
그렇다면 좀 더 많은 사람을 데리고 가는 게 좋겠어. 그래야 조금이라도 안전할 거야.
If that's the case, bring more people with you. It will be a little safer that way.
In that case take more people with you, so at least it's safer.
If that's the case, take more people. It will be a little safer that way.
speaker
portraits
msg
No, it’s actually the other way. We must keep a small team. Too many members will not work.
不，恰恰相反，这样的情况必须保证少人数的行动，目标太多反而会适得其反。
いえ、逆よ。このような状況では少人数で行動しなくちゃダメ。大所帯になりすぎるとかえって逆効果になってしまうのよ。
아니, 오히려 반대야. 이런 상황에서는 소수 인원으로 움직여야 해. 대가족이 되면 오히려 역효과를 불러일으킬 거야.
No, it’s actually the opposite. We must keep a small team. Too many members will just cause issues.
No, on the contrary, such a situation must ensure a small number of people in action, too many targets would be counterproductive.
No, the opposite. In a situation like this, you need a small group of people. Too large a group can be counterproductive.
msg
I will pick a few elite members from the Greymoths. We will have a team with single digit of members, so there will be sufficient people to protect the back.
我会在灰蛾部队中挑选几个精英成员，把人数控制在个位数，这样也可以有充分的战力来保护后方。
灰蛾部隊の中から精鋭を数人選んで、人数は1桁に抑える。その方が十分な戦力で後ろを守れるわ。
회나부대에서 정예를 몇 명 뽑아서 인원을 한 자리 수로 억제하는 거야. 그 편이 충분한 전력으로 뒤를 지킬 수 있으니까.

I'll select a few elites from the Grey Moths and keep the amount in the single digits. That way we'll have enough to protect the rear lines. (TN: Maybe "I'll select less than ten elites from the Grey Moths" would work better)
I will select a few elite members of the Grey Moth force and keep the numbers in single digits so that there will also be sufficient combat power to protect the rear.
Pick a few of the elite from the ash moth squad and keep the numbers to single digits. That way we'll have enough strength to protect our rear.

Yssring, Emesa and you, please defend Hyperion after we depart. The Houkai creatures will come again. Make sure everyone is safe.
伊瑟琳，埃米沙还有你，我们出发后休伯利安的防守就交给你们了，崩坏生物一定还会再来，一定要保证大家的安全。
イザーリン、エミザ、それからあなた。私たちが出発したらハイペリオンの防備は任せたわよ。崩壊生物はきっとまたやってくるわ。必ずみんなの安全を守ってね。
이자린, 에미자, 그리고 당신. 우리가 출발하면 히페리온의 방비는 맡길게. 붕괴 생물은 분명 다시 올 거야. 꼭 모두의 안전을 지켜줘.
Yiserin, Emesa, and you. We're leaving defending the Hyperion to you. The Honkai Beasts are going to come eventually, so make sure to keep everyone safe.
Estherine, Emesa and you, we leave the defense of Hublian to you, the collapse of the creatures will certainly come again, must ensure the safety of everyone.
Estherine, Emesa, and you. When we leave, Hyperion's defenses will be taken care of. The disintegrators will be back. Make sure you keep everyone safe.
choice
I will go with you.
我也一起去。
私も一緒に行く。
나도 같이 갈게.
Leave it to me.
交给我吧。
私に任せて。
내게 맡겨.
nop
CHOICE_DESTS
186: I agree. Bring her with you. If the leader dies outside, we are all gone.
我赞成，让她和你一起去，如果首领在外面死掉的话我们就全完了。
私は賛成だ。彼女も一緒に行かせたらどうだ？もし、リーダーが外で死んじまったら、それこそおしまいだからな。
나는 찬성이야. 그녀도 같이 가게 하는 게 어때? 만약 리더가 밖에서 죽어버리면 그게 진짜 끝이니까.
I agree. Why not let her go with you? If the leader dies out there, we're all screwed.
I'm for it, let her go with you, if the chief dies out there we're all screwed.
I agree. Why not let her go with us? If the leader dies out there, that would be the end.

아니, 너도 히메코와 같이 가 줘. 만약 리더가 밖에서 죽어버리면, 그럼 정말 끝장이니까.
No, you go with Himeko. If the leader dies out there, we're all screwed.
No, you go with Himeko. If the chief dies out there, we're all screwed.
No, you go with Himeko. If the leader dies out there, that would be the end.

You also said I know your situation the best. To me, this action is no different from committing suicide.
而且你也说了，我最清楚你的情况，你现在的行为在我看来和送死无异。
それに、死にに行くような行動に思えても、あんたなら不思議と上手くやれるような気がするんだ。
게다가, 죽으러 가는 듯한 행동으로 보여도, 너라면 이상하게도 잘 해낼 수 있을 것 같아.
You also said I know your condition the best. What you're doing right now seems no different than putting yourself in peril.
And as you said, I know your situation best, and what you're doing now seems to me to be the same as sending yourself to your death.
And even though it seems like a death-defying move, I have a feeling you'd be able to pull it off in a strange way.

Alright... You can go. But I will leave more people in Hyperion.

msg
Take care of Himeko! She is quite reckless, so make sure you bring her back if you are in danger. I don’t want to take risk and retrieve your bodies!
姬子的安全就交给你了！这个家伙喜欢乱来，如果遇到危机一定要阻止她一起回来，我可不想冒着危险给你们收尸！
姫子の安全は任せたからな！こいつメチャクチャやるから、危険なことをしようとしたら必ず止めてやってくれ。絶対、一緒に帰って来るんだぞ。危険を冒してまで、あんたらの死体を拾いに行きたくないからな！
히메코의 안전은 맡긴다! 이 녀석이 난장판을 만들 테니까, 위험한 일을 하려 들면 반드시 말려 줘. 절대 같이 돌아와야 해. 위험을 무릅쓰고까지, 너희들의 시체를 주우러 가고 싶지 않으니까!

I'm leaving Himeko's safety in your hands! She's quite reckless, so if she tries anything dangerous please stop her. I want both of you to come back safely. I'm not going to risk my life going out there to retrieve your corpses!
Himeko's safety is in your hands! This guy likes to mess around, if there is a crisis make sure to stop her from coming back together, I don't want to risk collecting bodies for you guys!

I leave Himeko's safety in your hands! He's going to mess up, so if he tries anything dangerous, make sure you stop him. I promise you, you're coming back with me. I'm not going to risk my life to pick up your corpses!
speaker
portraits
msg
Tsk, you need to work hard too. I don’t want to come back and see Hyperion become scraps.
哼，你们也好好努力吧，我也不想回来看到休伯利安变成一摊废铁。
ふんっ、あなたたちもしっかり頑張るのよ。私だって帰ってきたらハイペリオンがスクラップになっている光景なんて見たくないわ。
흥, 너희들도 제대로 힘내야 해. 나도 돌아왔을 때 히페리온이 스크랩으로 변해있는 광경은 보고 싶지 않다고.
Hmph, you'd better work hard. I don't want to come back and see Hyperion reduced to a pile of scrap metal.
Heck, you guys work hard too, and I don't want to come back and see Hublian reduced to a pile of scrap metal.
Hmph, you guys hang in there. I don't want to see Hyperion on the scrap heap when I get back either.
189: Our target is the abandoned car park in this area on the map. We need to arrive as fast as possible, retrieve the parts and return within 12 hours.
这次的目标是地图这里的废弃停车场，我们要以最快的速度抵达目标地点进行零件回收，并确保在12小时内返回。
今回の目標は地図のここ。スクラップ工場ね。最速でこの地点を目指し部品を回収。そして、12時間以内に戻ってくる。
이번 목표는 지도의 여기. 스크랩 공장이네. 최대한 빨리 이 지점을 향해 부품을 회수. 그리고 12시간 이내에 돌아와.
The target this time is the abandoned parking lot here on the map, we have to reach the target location as fast as possible for parts recovery and make sure to return within 12 hours.
This time, the target is here on the map. This is the scrap factory. We will go to this point as fast as possible, collect the parts, and come back within 12 hours. And come back within 12 hours.
Based on our past routes, it is safest to take this red line. It avoids the area with high concentration of Houkai creatures but we will travel about 6 more kilometers.
按照过去探查的路线来看，从这条红色的线路过去最为安全，这个路线避开了崩坏生物密集的区域，但是距离会增加6公里左右。
過去の探査ルートによれば、この赤いルートから行くのが最も安全ね。このルートは崩壊生物の密集エリアから離れているの。でも、距離が6キロほど増えるわ。
과거 탐사 루트에 따르면 이 빨간 루트로 가는 게 가장 안전해. 이 루트는 붕괴 생물의 밀집 구역에서 떨어져 있거든. 하지만 거리가 6km 정도 늘어나.
Based on our past scouting, this route highlighted in red is the safest. It avoids the highest concentration of Honkai Beasts, but we have to travel about 6 extra kilometers.
According to the route scouted in the past, it is safest to go through this red route, which avoids the dense area of collapsing creatures, but the distance will increase by about 6 km.
According to past exploration routes, the safest route to take is this red route. This route is away from the dense area of decaying organisms. But it increases the distance by about 6 km.
どうして知っているの？

msg
First, never abandon your teammates. Second, do not sacrifice easily.
第一不抛弃队友，第二不轻易牺牲。
その1、仲間は見捨てない。その2、軽々しく犠牲にならない。
첫째, 동료를 버리지 않는다. 둘째, 가볍게 희생되지 않는다.
First, never abandon your teammates. Second, do not make sacrifices lightly.
The first does not abandon teammates, and the second does not sacrifice easily.
1. Do not abandon your friends. 2. Do not make sacrifices lightly.
msg
Third, if the first two rules are in conflict, follow the first rule.
第三，如果前两条发生冲突就以第一条为准。
その3、この2つが矛盾した場合は1つ目に従う。
셋째, 이 둘이 모순될 경우 첫 번째를 따른다.
And third, if the first two rules are contradicting each other, then follow the first one.
Third, if the first two articles conflict, the first article shall prevail.
Number three, if these two contradict each other, the first is followed.
